RegexRule.Notes: The regular expressions must be enclosed in an XML CDATA section to match. Add the XML CDATA to encapsulate the regular expressions. As an example, you can use <![CDATA[(?i)fortify]]> to match the case-insensitive string "Fortify".

Description.Explanation: This issue is being reported by a custom generic Regex rule that matches on both FileNameRegex and ContentRegex.
